content.rendered:
Accommodations

Organising committee will provided Van (round trip) from Amari Don Muang and Asia Airport Hotel to AIT during conference days.

Asian Institute of Technology Conference Center (AITCC)

You can make reservations and referencing the “FOSS4G-2014” group rate.

Reservation :mailing to Email >> reservation@vpservice.co.th
More Detail about Facilities @ AITCC and Photo 
Download Shopping Area Near by Map
Instruction card (in Thai) to show your driver to the conference

Interactive Campus Map of AIT

AITCC Map

Amari Don Muang Airport Hotel

Link: http://www.amari.com/donmuang/

Location:
Don Muang Airport
Highlights:
Air Conditioned Walkway Connection direct to Don Muang Airport, Spacious Rooms (32-116 sq.m.), Henry J. Bean’s Bar & Grill, Swimming Pool
Transport:
– 5 Minutes walk from Don Muang Airport
– 45 Minutes Drive to Suvarnabhumi Airport
– 30 Minutes Drive to Asian Institute of Technology (AIT) 
Nearby:
Muang Thong Thanee, Future Park shopping and entertainment complex
Services:
Free WiFi, Free Shuttle Bus Services to BTS Morchit Station and MRT Chatuchak Station (Sat-Sun), Free overnight parking for guests
GPS:
13.920915, 100.600203

 Asia Airport Hotel

Link: http://www.asiahotel.co.th/asia_bangkok.htm

Location:
Zeer Rangsit, nearby Don Muang Airport
Highlights:
The 395 guest rooms and suites are modern and tastefully furnished with private bathroom with bathtub and shower, remote TV, individually controlled air conditioner. A free shuttle bus transfer is provided to and from Don Muang airport
Transport:
– 10 Minutes walk from Don Muang Airport
– 45 Minutes Drive to Suvarnabhumi Airport
– 20 Minutes Drive to Asian Institute of Technology (AIT) 
Nearby:
Zeer Rangsit (IT shopping complex), Future Park shopping and entertainment complex
Services:
WiFi, Free Shuttle Bus Services to Airport
